price: Ba bashitsi mu bamalayika bamwishura bati: “Burya tugushikirije agakuru keza! Iyi ni inkuru y’ukuri ivuye ku Mana yawe Allah, ntukabe rero mu bihebura ko batokwibaruka mu busaza”.
arabic: قَالُواْ بَشَّرۡنَٰكَ بِٱلۡحَقِّ فَلَا تَكُن مِّنَ ٱلۡقَٰنِطِينَ

meta.transliteration: qālū basharnāka bil-ḥaqi falā takun mina al-qāniṭīna
